price: 6. Kuwakani waa Aayadaha Ilaahay aan kuugu akhrinno (Nabiyow) si xaq ah, ee hadalkee bay Alle iyo Aayadihiisa kaddib rumeyn?
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثِۭ بَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ وَءَايَٰتِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi fabi-ayyi ḥadīthin baʿda al-lahi waāyātihi yu'minūna
